epics.title: Enterprise Authentication and Access Management
epics.summary: Implement enterprise-grade authentication and role-based access control with tenant isolation
epics.description: Develop a secure login system integrated with enterprise identity providers using SAML, OAuth2.0, or OpenID Connect protocols. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to manage user permissions based on organizational roles. Ensure strong tenant isolation, session management, and secure data boundaries to protect information across different organizations and user groups.

epics.title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Provider Integration
epics.summary: Enable the secure onboarding of multi-cloud accounts and integration with provider APIs
epics.description: Create workflows to allow users to onboard and authenticate their cloud accounts across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud. Integrate with each cloud provider’s API layer to manage service credentials, test connectivity, and establish a trusted communication channel. Implement secure storage and encryption for API credentials, tokens, and secrets to ensure compliance and data protection.

epics.title: Automated Multi-Cloud Resource Discovery and Normalization
epics.summary: Implement continuous resource discovery and normalization across multiple cloud environments
epics.description: Develop an automated discovery engine that interacts with provider APIs to identify all resources under onboarded accounts. Normalize resource data into a unified schema that standardizes category, type, region, cost, and ownership information. Implement delta-based synchronization and error handling to maintain accurate and always up-to-date resource inventories.

epics.title: Unified Dashboard and Visualization Layer
epics.summary: Provide a single-pane dashboard showing cloud resource inventory, cost, security, and compliance insights
epics.description: Design and build a personalized, interactive dashboard that aggregates key insights from all connected cloud accounts. Present data related to cost, resource inventory, security, and compliance in visually rich and dynamic charts. Enable searchable and filterable views based on user roles, accounts, providers, or regions to facilitate efficient operational decision-making.

epics.title: Cost Management and Optimization Insights
epics.summary: Develop cost analytics and optimization capabilities across multi-cloud environments
epics.description: Integrate with billing APIs and usage data sources from each cloud provider to consolidate spend analytics. Build models for cost anomaly detection, identify idle or underutilized resources, and recommend optimization opportunities. Provide visual cost breakdowns and forecasting tools for proactive budget management and financial governance.

epics.title: Security Posture and Compliance Evaluation
epics.summary: Create a rule-based assessment engine for cloud security and compliance posture
epics.description: Implement a continuous assessment engine that evaluates configurations and operations against security baselines and compliance frameworks such as CIS, NIST, and ISO 27001. Generate findings with severity classifications and remediation recommendations. Provide visibility into violations, impacted resources, and compliance scoring to maintain strong governance and security hygiene.

epics.title: Governance Automation and Workflow Integration
epics.summary: Enable automated policy enforcement and workflow integration with CI/CD and IaC tools
epics.description: Develop automation workflows to trigger policy enforcement, environment provisioning, tagging compliance, or remediation tasks. Integrate with CI/CD pipelines such as Jenkins, Azure DevOps, and GitLab, as well as Infrastructure-as-Code tools like Terraform and Ansible. Include approval workflows, rollback mechanisms, and audit tracking to ensure secure and accountable automation operations.

epics.title: Real-Time Alerts and Notifications
epics.summary: Implement event-driven alerts and notification mechanisms for cost, security, and compliance anomalies
epics.description: Develop an alerting framework that monitors cloud environments for critical conditions such as cost spikes, policy breaches, or security violations. Enable configurable thresholds, routing options, and multi-channel delivery including email, chat, and webhooks. Support escalation workflows, alert deduplication, and correlation for efficient incident management and response.

epics.title: Audit Logging and Activity History
epics.summary: Maintain a complete, immutable record of user actions and system events
epics.description: Implement comprehensive activity tracking and audit logging across both user-initiated and automated operations. Capture detailed metadata such as user identity, timestamps, resource changes, and triggered workflows. Store logs securely with encryption, support retention policies, and enable full traceability through query and export capabilities for compliance reporting.

epics.title: Scalability, Performance, and Reliability Enhancements
epics.summary: Ensure platform scalability, performance optimization, and high availability at enterprise scale
epics.description: Architect the system for horizontal scalability, enabling support for a growing number of users, cloud accounts, and data volumes. Implement caching, distributed processing, and load balancing strategies to enhance performance. Build failover, backup, and disaster recovery mechanisms to ensure system resilience, reliability, and continuous uptime in production environments.

user_stories.title: Secure Login System with Enterprise Identity Providers
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a secure login system that integrates with enterprise identity providers using SAML, OAuth2.0, or OpenID Connect, so that I can authenticate securely and easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement SAML, OAuth2.0, and OpenID Connect protocols. Ensure compatibility with major enterprise identity providers.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: Identity Providers, Authentication System, User Accounts
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can log in using SAML, OAuth2.0, or OpenID Connect.
2. The integration with major identity providers functions without errors.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a configured identity provider, When a user attempts to log in, Then they should be authenticated based on the chosen protocol.

user_stories.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to implement role-based access control (RBAC), so that I can manage user permissions based on organizational roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Define roles and associated permissions. Enforce permissions consistently across the platform.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Admins can define and assign roles. 
2. Users' permissions are enforced according to their assigned roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a defined role, When a user is assigned to this role, Then they should have permissions consistent with the role.

user_stories.title: Tenant Isolation and Secure Data Boundaries
user_stories.description: As a devops engineer, I want to ensure strong tenant isolation and secure data boundaries, so that information is protected across different organizations and user groups.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement tenant isolation and secure data boundaries. Ensure session management adheres to isolation principles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Data is isolated per tenant.
2. User sessions are managed securely to respect data boundaries.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a multi-tenant system, When a user from one tenant accesses data, Then they should not be able to see data from another tenant.

user_stories.epic_title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Provider Integration
user_stories.title: Workflow for Onboarding Multi-Cloud Accounts
user_stories.description: As a cloud engineer, I want workflows to onboard and authenticate multi-cloud accounts, so that I can manage a diverse cloud infrastructure securely.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud. Ensure secure authentication processes.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: Cloud Accounts, Authentication Workflows, Provider APIs
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can onboard cloud accounts securely.
2. The process supports AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud.
user_stories.test_cases: Given access credentials for a cloud provider, When a user initiates onboarding, Then the account should be authenticated and added securely.

user_stories.epic_title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Provider Integration
user_stories.title: Integration with Cloud Provider APIs
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want integration with cloud provider APIs, so that I can manage service credentials, test connectivity, and establish a trusted communication channel.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate with each provider’s API layer. Ensure secure API communication.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: Provider APIs, Service Credentials, Communication Channels
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Successful integration with AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud APIs.
2. Secure management of service credentials and tokens.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an onboarded cloud account, When testing connectivity, Then the API integration should function without errors.

user_stories.epic_title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Provider Integration
user_stories.title: Secure Storage and Encryption for Credentials
user_stories.description: As a security analyst, I want secure storage and encryption for API credentials, tokens, and secrets, so that sensitive data is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure encryption for storage of API credentials, tokens, and secrets. Meet compliance and data protection standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. API credentials and tokens are stored securely and encrypted.
2. Compliance with data protection standards is maintained.
user_stories.test_cases: Given stored credentials, When accessing them, Then they should be encrypted and secure.

user_stories.epic_title: Automated Multi-Cloud Resource Discovery and Normalization
user_stories.title: Automated Resource Discovery
user_stories.description: As a systems administrator, I want an engine that automatically discovers resources across cloud environments, so that I can maintain accurate resource inventories.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support continuous discovery across multiple clouds. Maintain accurate and up-to-date resource data.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: Discovery Engine, Cloud Resources, Resource Inventories
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Resources are discovered continuously and accurately across onboarded accounts.
2. Resource data is kept up-to-date.
user_stories.test_cases: Given onboarded cloud accounts, When discovery is run, Then resources should be identified accurately.

user_stories.epic_title: Automated Multi-Cloud Resource Discovery and Normalization
user_stories.title: Normalization of Resource Data
user_stories.description: As a data analyst, I want resource data to be normalized into a unified schema, so that I can easily compare and analyze resources across different clouds.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Standardize resource data schema. Include attributes like category, type, etc.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: Resource Schema, Normalized Data, Resource Attributes
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Resource data is normalized into a unified schema.
2. Attributes like category, type, and cost are standardized.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a variety of resource data, When normalizing, Then it should adhere to a standardized schema.

user_stories.epic_title: Automated Multi-Cloud Resource Discovery and Normalization
user_stories.title: Delta-Based Synchronization
user_stories.description: As a cloud resource manager, I want delta-based synchronization to update resource inventories, so that I can track changes efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement delta synchronization. Ensure error handling during updates.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: Resource Inventories, Synchronization Process, Error Logs
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Resource updates are tracked using delta-based synchronization.
2. Errors during synchronization are handled gracefully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given updated resources, When synchronizing, Then only changes should be processed.
